info.title: Interactive Digital Library
info.description:
Interactive digital library that offers e-books, magazines, and educational resources. Each resource will be a separate micro frontend, and users will be able to read, annotate, and share content.

Some useful links:
- [The Interactive Digital Library API repository](https://github.com/LirioMendoza/DigitalLibraryAPI)
